contentList.content: Strike <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> target to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyse</LSTag> it.

Strike <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> target and deal [1] and inject <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISON_SPIDER_QUEEN_CONDITION">Spider Queen's Neurotoxin</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyse</LSTag> target's nervous system on [2] round(s).
You are overwhelmed by unbearable hunger. -[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, but you gain a +[2] bonus to Initiative Rolls.

Entity is exchausted and has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and most <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
